article_title: Halbig Win Today Puts Health Care Act At Risk

article_metadata.description: Halbig. Remember that name. It hasn't gotten a lot of press to date but trust me, it will. A decision today in the U.S. Court of Appeals in Halbig poses one of the greatest challenges to the Obamacare since its inception.   So why did Hobby Lobby and Wheaton garner more attention? [...]
article_metadata.author: Kelly Phillips Erb
